definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
to sensationalize (idiom); deliberate exaggeration to scare people
tall and erect, reaching through the clouds (idiom); used to describe tall mountain or skyscraper
to shake (a part of one's body)/to shrug (shoulders)/to create a sensation/to incite
to startle sb with scary tale

sentences.english: The haunted house on the hill brooded above the village.
sentences.chinese: 山上鬧鬼的房子赫然聳現在村莊之上。

sentences.english: No. 9, 5th team, Songba village, Deerhead town, Zhaoyang, Hubei …
sentences.chinese: 湖北省早陽市鹿頭鎮聳扒村五組9號用英語怎麼寫？

sentences.english: He arched his eyebrows in mock surprise.
sentences.chinese: 他假裝喫驚地聳起雙眉。

sentences.english: One side of her mouth pulled in, and she shrugged with one shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她抿着半邊嘴脣，聳着一隻肩膀。

definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
to correct/to rectify/to redress/strong/brave/to pretend/to feign/affectation
to visit places famous for their scenery
